WorkItems.FeaturesQuery: Select [Id] From WorkItems Where [System.TeamProject] = 'Mintek' And [System.State] = 'Ready for Release' And [System.WorkItemType] <> 'Bug'
WorkItems.FixesQuery: Select [Id] From WorkItems Where [System.TeamProject] = 'Mintek' And [System.State] = 'Ready for Release' And [System.WorkItemType] = 'Bug'
WorkItems.WorkItemFields: System.Id, System.Title, System.State, System.WorkItemType, Custom.ReleaseNotesNotes, TranscendentAgile.DeploymentNotes
